resources.string:
Confusion matrix:
%1$s
Precisions: %2$s
Recalls: %3$s
F1 score – micro: %4$f
F1 score – macro: %5$f
Accuracy: %6$f

INSTRUCTIONS \nPlace the directories containing test photos in `%1$s`. Each test-case directory should contain that test case\'s photos, of which exactly one should be the reference photo and have a filename starting with `%2$s`.\n
